content:
@Luke McCormick Do you know if Node Export is working? ie. https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/node_export/issues/1

Porting node_export 路 Issue #1 路 backdrop-contrib/node_export
I really want/need a way to get data into and out of my various nascent Backdrop sites, so a few days ago I ported node_export and its required dependency UUID. I haven't posted UUID yet, so th...
Specifically, I'm curious if I could use Node Export on D7 to export some webforms and then use Node Export on Backdrop to import them without going through an entire site upgrade process...

Laryn said:

Luke McCormick Do you know if Node Export is working? ie. https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/node_export/issues/1

Probably not. I haven't looked at it in years.
On a positive note, it seemed pretty straightforward, so I doubt if it would be hard to bring it up to speed. The code was was simple even I was able to understand it.
